title: Afghan government, rights groups accuse Taliban of abuses in Kunduz battle

Published By: Reuters - World news - Today 
KABUL (Reuters) - The Afghan government on Sunday accused the Taliban of carrying out human rights abuses during two weeks of fighting for c...
